Activate: Create a product option by defining option values with translation key, sku and price. By adding more than 1 option value below, you will create an option group. With an option group your customer can choose one option from this group.
激活: 通过定义具有翻译键、SKU和价格的选项值来创建产品选项。通过在下面添加多个选项值，您将创建一个选项组。使用选项组，您的客户可以从该组中选择一个选项。
取消页面上的所有选择
